name: Floppy Whale 2.0
description:
Captured for his tasty meat and unrivaled good looks! Floppy Whale has just escaped from the clutches of a hungry village. Flop for your life as you dodge wave after wave of flying spears, helping Floppy Whale to survive as long as you can!

Now available on iTunes!

Twitter @iCarbonsAndrew #floppywhale

Sweet pixel art from @thisislux

Built with Stencyl

SFX made with BFXR
